arts.ttl: Fulham out to end 11-year winless run in Aston Villa fixture

arts.sum: Aston Villa will be looking to end a 15-year streak and avoid setting a 78-year first when they play host to Fulham in the Premier League on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Fulham predictions: First Premier League win coming for Villa
arts.sum: Aston Villa have endured a dismal start to the new Premier League season, but Ross Kilvington expects them to put a first win on the board when they play host to Fulham.
